blocks.name: elrfi
blocks.content: Elementhood in a set of relative finite intersections. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cmpfiiin
blocks.content: In a compact topology, a system of closed sets with nonempty finite intersections has a nonempty intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)

  syl3anc(w0, wne(cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))), emptycls), wcel(c3, ccmp), wss(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))), cfv(ccld, c3)), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))))))

  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wn(wceq(emptycls, cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cfn)))
